LIGHT SOURCE

Are we alone in the universe?

CANS COMING SOON! STAY TUNED!

A light lager infused with ginger. Rice makes the body light and crisp and also makes this beer gluten reduced. Sorachi Ace hops provide mild lemon and citrus notes.
